sections.heading: Partner Practice: Obstacles & Fixes
sections.body: A narrates a 2-leg route with **1 obstacle** (CL:B block or traffic) and **1 fix** (detour or ask officer). B plays helper (RS) to give the fix. Swap roles.

callouts.title: Neutral Returns
callouts.body: Between RS lines, pop back to center so anchors stay clear.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **18â€“25s**: route + dialogue including **time-first**, **1 CL:3 path**, **1 CL:1 path**, **1 obstacle + fix**, **2 RS lines**, **FINISH** at the end of a leg.
sections.teacherNote: Caption which anchors you used and where the obstacle/fix occurred.
